Class Competition

java.lang.Object
Competition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LuckyNumbersCompetition, RandomPickCompetition
public abstract class Competition extends Object implements Serializable
Implements Serializable so it can be saved to file
See Also:

    • addWinningEntry

      public void addWinningEntry(Entry entry)
      Adds an entry to the winning entries list. If an entry belongs to a member already with a winning entry, the winning amount will be compared and existing entry replaced if the new entry has a higher winning amount.
      Parameters:
      entry - the entry to add

    • getWinningEntries

      public ArrayList<Entry> getWinningEntries()
      Gets the list of winning entries
      Returns:
      the list of winning entries

    • selectBill

      public Bill selectBill(UserConsole console, DataProvider data)
      Allows user to input bill number and validate against data. This method is *blocking* as the user must provide a valid bill Id.
      Parameters:
      console - the user console for input
      data - a member of the data provider class
      Returns:
      the bill if it passes all of the validation criteria

    • calculateEligibleEntries

      public int calculateEligibleEntries(double billAmount)
      Calculates how many entries is eligible based on a bill amount
      Parameters:
      billAmount - the amount from the bill
      Returns:
      number of entries the bill is eligible for based on MIN_ENTRY_AMOUNT

    • addEntries

      public abstract void addEntries(UserConsole console, DataProvider data)
      Adds an entry to the competition
      Parameters:
      console - user console for input
      data - data provider for bill and member information
